metadata.description:
Introducing the fifth hedSOLO artist, Rohaan. A staple in the UK bass scene who's garnered support from heavy hitters like Noisia and Zeds Dead, Rohaan has carved out his own lane in a chaotic underground scene. He's been highly regarded for his innovative sound design and distinctive musical voice, which features both aggressive, high-energy rhythms and more ambient, atmospheric textures. Ahead of his US Tour, we've been blessed with the first Drum and Bass track he ever created. Here's a quote from Rohaan about the song... 

"As this was the first ever DnB track that I ever produced, 'I Want You' holds a very special place in my discography and music career. You will be the first to hear it in its entirety! 

This was created when I switched from FL studio to Ableton and was exploring new sonic territory.

I adore the world this song paints when I hear it, it seems hopeful and wrapped in nostalgia.

I hope this track can mean something to you also.

R. xx "

Look forward to more hedSOLO drops every month via the heds community, exclusively on Sound.
metadata.name: Rohaan - I Want You #1
metadata.title: Rohaan - I Want You
